"That you're not allergic to bees, Your Majesty. Your mother lied to you. Which coincidently, is not really your mother." revealed Buzz.

Speechless, all I can say is "What?"

"Yes, your Majesty. You've been banished from the bee kingdom at an early age and you have been turned into a human as a punishment." Buzz said.

"Why was I punished? What did I do?" I asked.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

Completely shocked, I muttered, "You... you... you're a bee?" "Why yes, Your Majesty. Name's Buzz, and I've been your personal bee for years." the bee replied.

"Buzz? Personal bee?! Am I dreaming?" I said as I tried pinching myself to see if this was just a dream.

"I sure hope not, Your Majesty. I've been waiting for years to tell you this." said Buzz.

"Tell me what, exactly?" I asked.

"That you're not allergic to bees, Your Majesty. Your mother lied to you. Which coincidently, is not really your mother." revealed Buzz.

Speechless, all I can say is "What?"

"Yes, your Majesty. You've been banished from the bee kingdom at an early age and you have been turned into a human as a punishment." Buzz said.

"Why was I punished? What did I do?" I asked.

"Well, you did something that was very... unbee-lievable." said Buzz jokingly. "When you were a kid, you were playing with your friends in the garden and you cut a bee hive to fall from a tree." continued Buzz.

"I did that as a bee?" I asked confusingly. 

"You really don't remember, huh?" Buzz said. "Well now, our queen died years ago and you're next in line to be queen. We've been trying to get you for years!" revealed Buzz.

"But how can I even lead you as a queen?" I asked. "I'm human!"

"Well, can say your orders every now and then," said Buzz. "Our new bee hive is just outside of your house."

"Well, okay then." I said. "I guess I'm your new queen."

"Yes, Your Majesty." said Buzz. "Buzz out!"

Completely shocked, I muttered, "You... you... you're a bee?" "Why yes, Your Majesty. Name's Buzz, and I've been your personal bee for years." the bee replied.

"Buzz? Personal bee?! Am I dreaming?" I said as I tried pinching myself to see if this was just a dream.

"I sure hope not, Your Majesty. I've been waiting for years to tell you this." said Buzz.

"Tell me what, exactly?" I asked.

"That you're not allergic to bees, Your Majesty. Your mother lied to you. Which coincidently, is not really your mother." revealed Buzz.

Speechless, all I can say is "What?"

"Yes, your Majesty. You've been banished from the bee kingdom at an early age and you have been turned into a human as a punishment." Buzz said.

"Why was I punished? What did I do?" I asked.

"Well, you did something that was very... unbee-lievable." said Buzz jokingly. "When you were a kid, you were playing with your friends in the garden and you cut a bee hive to fall from a tree." continued Buzz.

"I did that as a bee?" I asked confusingly. 

"You really don't remember, huh?" Buzz said. "Well now, our queen died years ago and you're next in line to be queen. We've been trying to get you for years!" revealed Buzz.

"But how can I even lead you as a queen?" I asked. "I'm human!"

"Well, can say your orders every now and then," said Buzz. "Our new bee hive is just outside of your house."

"Well, okay then." I said. "I guess I'm your new queen."

"Yes, Your Majesty." said Buzz. "Buzz out!" said Buzz.
